title: You Don’t Know Your Real Potential…
description: The human ego in its current models is a fragmented and internally conflicted operating system. This condition creates affective and cognitive deadlocks, repetitive self-sabotage, delusional projections, and stunted capacity to function as a responsible adult. Spiritual practice must focus on the integration and resolution of contradictory attitudes and drives. Once accomplished, your consciousness can expand to higher levels of intelligence and creative power that can blossom into total freedom

title: How the Bhagavad Gita Can Change Your Life
description: Shunyamurti reveals why the Bhagavad Gita is a time-released teaching—a terma designed for this very moment at the end of Kali Yuga. We are all Arjuna now, standing on the battlefield of the soul, faced with the choice: surrender the reins to God or remain trapped in the ego’s illusions. In this powerful satsang, Shunyamurti explains Krishna’s first instructions to Arjuna: do not mourn, endure all conditions, discover the indestructible Self, and fight the only battle that matters—the inner war

title: The 10 Defenses Against Anxiety (and Why They Fail)
description: In this teaching, Shunyamurti reveals the 10 major defenses the ego uses to escape anxiety. These strategies may seem to offer relief, but ultimately they deepen suffering and block the path to liberation. True freedom comes only when we courageously face anxiety at its root and discover the Self that is beyond fear.

title: Why Modern Egos Need a Different Medicine
description: In this satsang, Shunyamurti reflects on why the profound truths of the Ashtavakra Gita so often fail to penetrate the postmodern ego, which forms prematurely as a defense against fear, pain, and abandonment. Drawing on the Sat Yoga Chakra Map, he explains how the first three assemblage points entangle us in security needs, desire, and power struggles—and how the ego’s confusion of love with desire keeps us bound in suffering.

title: The Secret Nonduality of Energy and Information
description: After exploring the deep insights in the teaching of the Ashtavakra Gita regarding the way to shift from ego-mind to the infinite intelligence of the Self, Shunyamurti adds another level of subtlety to the method. He explains how the energy of our fundamental nature is converted into information that appears as a holographic continuum of experience. When that information is converted back into the light of pure consciousness, the transcendent Self is realized.

title: The Secret Between Every Two Moments
description: In this teaching, Shunyamurti reveals the hidden structure of consciousness that unfolds in nanoseconds between every two thoughts. He maps seven micro moments—from the instant of naked presence to the reinstallation of ego identity—showing how awareness of these stages gives you the power to shift your trajectory in real time. In the “between,” where thought has not yet fixed who you are or how you see the world, lies your greatest freedom. By remaining in pure presence, you open the door to In

title: Putin, Trump, and the Bhagavad Gita – Is Global War Inevitable?
description: In this urgent satsang, Shunyamurti shares that he received the message that we are at the moment depicted in the Bhagavad Gita, when Arjuna understands and accepts that he must fight the battle he dreads, knowing it will destroy civilization. Reflecting on the aftermath of the failed Putin–Trump summit in Alaska, in the context of the imminent collapse of Western hegemony, and the fractal nature of reality—meaning that all of us face such a situation in our own lives as well— Shunya explains th

title: Why Be Attached to a Fictional Character?
description: As the world situation deteriorates and total war appears imminent, there could not be a more auspicious moment for instant enlightenment, liberation, and ascension. The correct method is outlined in the ancient Ashtavakra Samhita. Shunyamurti reads and analyzes key chapters, explaining the way to drop all attachments to one’s fictional character in the matrix and to that character’s illusory world. This brings consciousness into resonance with the infinite luminous intelligence of the Ultimate

title: Putin-Trump Summit: Spiritual Warning & Solution
description: As Putin and Trump meet in a tense moment of global brinkmanship, Shunyamurti offers a teaching on how to remain unshaken in the face of uncertainty. Drawing from the Ashtavakra Samhita, he explains how to free yourself from anxiety, transcend identification with body and ego, and abide in the constant presence of pure awareness. In a collapsing world, this is the timeless path to inner freedom — beyond fear, beyond reaction, and beyond the reach of external events.

title: Escape from the Ten Kinds of Bondage You Are In!
description: The soul must understand the nature of its bondages. Your power will remain limited and your happiness elusive until you overcome these ten forms of psychological dis-ease that the ego is prone to suffering. Sat Yoga is a path to freedom.

title: Be Victorious Over Self-Deception
description: We are living near the end of this age, and our responsibility is to prepare our souls to create a more beautiful, peaceful, awakened culture in the age to come. This requires us to attune to our true essential nature as pure spirit, and to let go of all tendencies of self-deception. This comes down to letting go of the false self entirely. We must open our hearts and minds to our infinite and eternal consciousness. This is the aim of an authentic spiritual path.

title: Why Be Duped Into Dissatisfaction?
description: The reading of chapter two of the Ashtavakra Samhita is the basis of this teaching on the joy of Self-Realization. Sustained joy is not possible for the ego, since it projects its own shadow on the world and suffers as a result. But, when it is understood that one is Pure Consciousness—that all is the One Infinite Intelligence and that the world is only a reflection of the Self at play—then divine beauty is directly perceived, unconditional love is felt, and perfection is recognized.

title: Religious Nihilism vs. the Lightning Bolt of Truth
description: We humans have become seduced by images and have lost touch with our inner essence. We mistake this simulation for a real world; thus, the Real, or God, has become an empty signifier even for those who claim to be religious. The current ego structure is programmed to love sensory enjoyments, but to avoid and cover over with noise and pictures the silence and stillness of the inmost Self. Silence has come to signify death, which has been desperately repressed, so the Death Drive returns as global

title: The FINAL STEP to Enlightenment
description: What is Sat Yoga, truly? In this electrifying teaching, Shunyamurti returns us to the original foundation of all true yogic paths: the complete and instantaneous renunciation of the ego through the love of the infinite Self. This is not a path of gradualism or compromise. It is a radical return to the Real, beyond all illusion, trauma, fear, or thought. True liberation comes not with time, but with unwavering determination, tapas, and surrender. This is the final frontier—the rite of passage int

title: How to Win the Video Game of Life
description: It is easy to understand why the ego mind has no freedom. Neither does it have originality or courage, nor even the ability to love, in the real sense of that word. The secret to leading a fulfilling life is simple: your soul must awaken and extract itself from the limitations of the ego straitjacket. Once free, the soul can easily transform its personal identity to accurately reflect its divine nature of limitless potency. This is the goal of the spiritual quest.

title: What Happens the Moment the Veil Falls Away
description: There comes a moment in the life of every sincere seeker of ultimate Truth when the veil of illusion finally falls away. But it requires a lot of preparation. One needs uncommon sense to reason through the barrier of the unreal, and a willingness to dialectically negate one’s own desire for the Real when that becomes the new barrier. Then, even that negation must be negated by the immolation of the last trace of a tendency of the mind to produce an egocentric thought.

title: Is the Empire Now Meeting its Waterloo?
description: By entering this war, the US is accelerating toward direct conflict with opposing great powers. Gog and Magog may soon enact the prophesied battle of Armageddon. What better time to attain divinization? The secret of receiving the grace of the Rapture is to surrender to the Presence of the Transcendent Absolute God-Self by simply letting go of all else.

title: Time to Fulfill Your True Promise!
description: The war in west Asia is a reflection of the war in consciousness that is being played out in every fractal of the whole of the cosmic manifestation. It is the same war that is commemorated in the Bhagavad Gita. The secret instruction to gain victory for the soul over the demonic ego is most clearly delivered in an ancient text called the Ashtavakra Samhita. There are eight major curves on the road to divine liberation. We must steer the mind accurately around each curvature of conscious space.

title: How to Reach God Through Reason
description: We take in a philosophic argument, made by Abhinavagupta (the great sage of the Trika wisdom school of Kashmir) and delivered by a fine living philosopher named Chakravarthi Ram-Prasad, that proves the truth of the all-pervasive unity of Consciousness. In other words, this simple line of reasoning brings the mind to the very edge of the ego illusion, enabling an easy recognition of the state beyond thought that is the Presence of God. This is the most direct path to Liberation.

title: War! (What Does God Have to Do With it?)
description: The world has gone mad. Every kind of war is breaking out, at every level of social organization and individual ego structure. Yet, there is divine order hidden in this utter chaos. It is our spiritual duty to emanate peace and divine love and, amid the exploding bombs, to deliver the healing balm of the Presence of God.

title: Gunfight at the Ego Corral
description: We are at the historic moment of showdown at every fractal level of the holographic motion picture show. To win the duel with the ego, the soul must be willing to surrender to the Real Self. But certain preparations must be made to disempower the ego. If one knows the stages of the path, it is easier to navigate through the narrow passage to Freedom.

title: Why Accept Being Framed?
description: Every ego has been framed. Even knowing that though, it continues its self-framing regardless of the suffering that it causes to itself. The ego prefers a dysfunctional identity to none at all. Every authentic spiritual tradition tries to offer a way out, but very few egos are interested.

title: Neocons, Katechons, and the Incon-ceivable Self
description: The unfolding drama in the unreal world is but the rebirth pangs of Cosmic Self-realization. The Eternal Light of God is washing away the last traces of the manifest mandala of divine human history and those of every world system—simply by dissolving the stain of emotionality that hides the Bliss of the Real.

title: The Gates of Hell Are Opening . . . But So Is the Strait Gate to Heaven
description: The world situation is dire. The US economy is in its death throes. Europe is also coming apart. Store shelves will soon be empty. War is threatened or has already erupted in every region. And the same is happening in the microcosm of nearly every ego. Chaos is accelerating to final destruction. Yet this is a blessing, a merciful quick end to a dying world. The Light of God is becoming more palpable as well, at least to those souls who have faith in and love for the Supreme Lord. We have the inh

title: Why Politicians Sell Their Integrity
description: We are living in a time of disillusionment with the world, especially with political leaders. Even those once thought to stand tall for vital principles will sell out when offered high posts in the system—and do it shamelessly. The same pattern is emerging at every fractal level. Yet this winding down of history into a final power struggle will at the end be overridden by the revelation of the truth of God. There will be no atheists at the Eschaton.

title: God and Human Merge at the Time of Your Crucifixion
description: What kind of world are we in? Could it be a fiction? How would that affect your ego’s crucifixion? And if the world is suddenly perceived as filled with zombies, how does the heart react? Does ego death seem more appealing? If so, we have a formula to help you disappear.

title: Tariffs and the Trade War: The Deeper Implications
description: Shunyamurti explains the psychological and spiritual meaning and implications of the erratic Trump policies, as well the geopolitical effects of the rising tensions and conflicts in this accelerating phase shift that is now underway in the world—and replicated at every fractal level of reality. It is a true synchronicity that all this is unfolding just as we enter the Passover-Easter Holy Week.

title: How Will You Resolve Your Inner Conflicts?
description: In this discourse on deliverance from desire and dharma, the force vectors of suffering are deconstructed so that the desperation and depression of the lacking ego can be put to permanent rest. A simple error of logic knots Eros to Thanatos in the deflated heart.

title: You Can’t Get Illumination—You Are That!
description: You have to grok this paradox: You must want Illumination, but wanting will never reach it. The wanting must morph into surrender. Surrender even wanting. More than that, surrender the thought that there is anyone separate from God who must surrender. When there is no I-thought and no sense of Other or world—as in deep sleep but fully awake—the Self is realized and nothing else remains, or ever was.

title: Accurate Knowledge Removes All Fear and Suffering
description: Once it is recognized that the apparent world is only the mind engaged in dreaming, then the nonduality of consciousness and its contents can be understood and its vast implications can be unfolded. But it can take some time to digest and integrate all the binaries (the polarities, like good and evil, immanent and transcendent) in order to gain accurate knowledge that brings freedom from suffering—even the awareness that there is no suffering, since the world and the whole seeming multiplicity o

title: The Natural Sobriety of Ecstasy
description: The final period of every cycle of time is one of spiritual exhaustion, the soul’s exile from the Light of God, the ego’s nihilistic cynicism combined with narcissistic hubris, and the ominous approach of world destruction. We have arrived at that time. Fortunately, every spiritual tradition declares that such a hell realm is actually the most auspicious moment of all, for that is when the Inner Light returns—first only for a few—but then more and more souls become illumined. This is the true Fe

title: The Heart Must Be in Charge of Reason
description: Only once the heart is fully open and integrated with the intellect will the nondual wisdom accurately emerge and function with all its potency in the morphogenic field. This grace is always accessible if one is willing to use one’s margin of free will to surrender to the Absolute.

title: The Technique of Detachment from Technique
description: An ancient sutra called the Netra Tantra teaches a different form of ashtanga (eight-limbed) yoga. Unlike Patanjali’s version, this Shaivite yoga describes how to live in nonduality. It is essential to master the arts of letting go, of accepting, and of seeing the unreality of ego (including one’s own) and the dreamlike nature of the entire world. Most of all, the closed heart must open.

title: Creation Did Not Arise from Nothing
description: The world did not appear out of nowhere, but arises within the Mind of God. Because the nature of Absolute Consciousness is freedom, joy, creativity, and limitless power, the world process cannot be grasped by a finite mind. But since every limited consciousness is only separated from the Infinite Self by a thin veil of willful ignorance, it takes only a simple shift of attitude to become reabsorbed into the blissful light of Liberation.

title: The Seven Levels of Love
description: As we grow psychologically and spiritually, our understanding and appreciation of love evolve into more altruistic modes of expression and unconditional inclusion, until infinite love is attained. This is the glory of divinization and the completion of our pilgrimage through many lives to the real essence of who we are.

title: Only Love Can Break our Chains
description: Every moment is priceless as the world hurtles toward the Eschaton. The highest priority of yogis must now be such intense and one-pointed adoration of the Supreme Self that we earn the grace of liberation from our bondages to the illusory ego and its attachments. It is now or never.

title: The Great Task is Learning to Abide in Stillness
description: Learn to listen with the third ear to the Voice of Silence within. Only then can the mind grok the awesome truth that you are consciousness that has never been born and will never die. But the mental program of the ego must be eliminated to sustain the attunement to the Real. This teaching is exemplified in the fundamental tantra of the Dzogchen lineage.

title: Our Sickness is an Allergy to Love
description: A vampire is draining your life energy, dumbing you down, and keeping you in a state of internal oppression projected as an external world. The vampire is your ego. It produces incoherent and delusional attitudes that keep one paralyzed in the holographic nightmare. There is only one way to defeat a vampire.

title: Love Creates, Love Destroys, Love Has the Last Laugh
description: Partial love is the cause of evil. Total love brings salvation. But there is no escape from love. The end of the world is love’s last laugh. But since love is eternal, the end is always a new beginning. Don’t you love it?

title: The Paradox of Impermanence
description: The Yogacara school of Buddhism asserts that we all have three natures. The first is imaginary, made up of projections of the ego. The second is other-dependent, which is equally unreal—but focused on the superego and its appendage, the external Other. Fortunately, we also have a third nature, and this is our sovereign freedom. This state of Self-realization is beyond duality and intellectual conception.

title: Are You Living Your Life in the Rear-View Mirror?
description: It is crucial to have a conversation with your future Death while you are still alive. Only once you are at peace with Death can you live a truly fulfilling life. What happens when you let go of identification with the body is then explained, revealing important esoteric information.

title: What is God Doing Nowadays?
description: We read and reflect upon a teaching poem written ten centuries ago by the great Kashmiri sage Sri Abhinavagupta reveals the functions of God-Consciousness in these final days of this holographic presentation we call the world. Even more importantly, the difficulties of spiritual seekers are explained, as well as the way out of the illusion of individual existence.

title: Our Holographic Matrix is a Mathematical Equation
description: Manifest reality can be perceived through the language of words, illuminating the symbolic meaningfulness and aesthetic qualities of its subtle spiritual nature. But the world can also be translated into the language of number. In the last ten centuries, human consciousness has become increasingly mathematized. Capitalism is all about quantity: how much is something worth, how many are available, what will be the amount of return on my investment, how large will be my profits in the coming year,

title: How to Bust the Ghost that Haunts You
description: The ego is the shadow of fear that haunts our lives and creates our suffering, increased by the ego’s addition of the compensatory defenses of anger, envy, hatred, avoidance, and other emotional tendencies that produce unhappiness. Inner work culminates in the recognition that the ego is unreal and obsolete as an operating system. Consciousness is then free to realize its unborn, formless, loving, and infinite nature.

title: We Suffer from Gnostalgia
description: The ego suffers from nostalgia for the lost pseudo-paradise of the womb and the adoring mother at birth. The soul suffers from gnostalgia for the lost ecstasy in the Heart of God. The God-Self laughs, as nothing real was ever lost.

title: How to Read a Text on Enlightenment
description: In this opening class on the analysis of a Buddhist book of poems on the attainment of enlightenment, we learn to focus on the unspoken implications of the text, to unravel metaphors, and to perceive contradictions and points of incoherence.

title: Change the Inner Station to which You are Tuned
description: The different wavelengths of the mind transmit a wide spectrum of levels of consciousness and thus of happiness and freedom. You can change the station you are currently attuned to, and that will change your life. The sky is the limit of how high you can choose to fly into the Infinite Intelligence of the all-encompassing Self.

title: The Secret of the World’s Self-Destruction
description: As we approach the Omega Point, destructive tendencies are increasing until they explode in total global war as well as massive upheavals of Nature, bringing this world cycle to a close. Before that, we have the opportunity to resonate with the highest wavelength of absolute consciousness and be absorbed into the deathless rapture of the Infinite Blissful Self. Consider this a test of how you deploy your inner freedom now, in the very short time that remains.

title: Karma is God’s Way of Getting Our Attention
description: We are constantly receiving messages from God via the world, via dreams, and via meditative attention to our Being. If we modify our thinking and our plans in accord with the information that comes through synchronicities, and if we resonate with the vibrational frequency of the Supreme Real, karma drops away in nonduality.

title: Are You Dreaming? Or Being Dreamed? Or Both?
description: You may think you are living in an existent world, but all is the imagination of an infinite intelligence. Your ego may believe it is in control, but that is only God’s joke. However, after the ego illusion drops away, You will realize You are the Joker.

title: The Yoga of Total Escalation Dominance
description: Only the intensity of constant tapas, the white heat of the Fire of Yoga, brings the ecstasy of sahaja samadhi—and the power to overcome all obstacles. We must be victorious over the escalating chaos, depravity, and destruction that are laying waste our once unspoiled world. The purification of consciousness is the only means to dominate the death drive—and dream a new world into Being.

title: How to Play With the Illusion of Existence
description: There is nothing to teach because all is God. There is no one in ignorance, bondage, or suffering. And no one ever gets free. There is only one Self—and the Self is always free! Always luminous, brilliant, and blissful! All the questions about karma are only significant within the frame of reference of a bubble on a crashing wave in the ocean of consciousness.

title: Don’t Underestimate the Power of Para Shakti
description: Self-decapitation is the first step on the path. But chopping off the ego mind, though necessary, is not sufficient. If you stop there, you may be lost in emptiness. By adoring Para Shakti, the World Mother, the Mind underlying all appearance, you will be recapitated with a divine intelligence. Then you will be free from the phenomenal plane, recognizing it as a mirror image of your dreaming mind.

title: The Tide of Life is Ebbing Out
description: We are in an unprecedented low tide of life’s ocean. Destructive forces are dominant. Reason has nearly disappeared. Law is a joke. Love is a myth. The meaning is a mystery. There is nothing to do but return to the Real, the Source of a new High Dreamtide.

title: Let Us Lead All Souls to the Light
description: Nothing could be easier than realization of the Self. The only obstacle is the narrative of the fictional ego, that has no interest in the discovery of its unreal nature—or in meeting its Dreamer—since the pseudo-self will die instantly in that encounter. But when you are weary enough of the burdens carried by the conditioned persona and long to be free—and you wholeheartedly make the decision to silence the ego’s mental chatter forever—the eternal Essence of your Being will shine with such powe

title: The Radical Shift from Delusion to the Real
description: The true Self has nondual vision—perceiving the unity of samsara and nirvana, immanence and transcendence, form and emptiness. Once the split mind of the false ego has gained the courage to withdraw into stillness, the One Light is perceived within and in the many outer forms. The supreme will and intelligence who is dreaming this apparent world—your infinite Self—is now bringing a merciful end to the delusional hell realm that it has become, and will then dream a heavenly world to replace it. I

title: The Ego is a Self-Playing Game
description: Psychoanalysis was developed by a neurotic ego and designed to enable other neurotic egos to function more productively despite their inherent internal conflicts. But psychosis was another matter. It is a condition that could not be fully theorized or manipulated by psychoanalytic technique, and so the bizarre mode of suffering of a psychotic person was repressed to justify its limited focus and non-existent success rate.

title: God is Transgender: Both Shiva and Shakti
description: God’s secret, that the ego cannot grasp, is that the unmanifest potency (the Supreme Lord) emanates the manifest world—the form of the Goddess—within unmanifest Mind. The dream is not other than the mind of the dreamer. The dream is a dance of duality in all its possible expressions. The phenomenal plane is also the noumenal: samsara is nirvana. One must not take priority over the other, since they are the same.

title: There Are No Victims in the Real
description: Our souls are in this game to learn—and to become true masters over all the conditions that arise in the holographic simulation. Once one takes responsibility for one’s karma, the portal to freedom opens. Dropping the ego narrative is easy as soon as you recognize that the body (and its operating system) is not you. What you are is consciousness without name, form, attitudes, or thoughts. You are the luminous intelligence of the Absolute Self. When That is realized, suffering ends.

title: Conflict and Convergence Are Not Two
description: On a single day, various religions celebrate symbolically congruent holidays, but the names and myths obscure the unity of meaning behind the signifiers of difference. Yet, the pilgrims who take their destination seriously as an inner state of Being come to appreciate the divine humor of the illusory projection that seems to separate the many from the One.

title: The Catch-22 That Catches Every Soul
description: Has your consciousness been hooked like a fish by the illusory lure of desire, penetrated by the point of fear, and trapped by the barb of belief in the ego’s reality? If you have arrived at such a rebarbative condition of pseudo-existence, then it may be time to start practicing a form of yoga that will release you from the delusional capture in this dream field. But be prepared to face the truth that you have been caught by your Self, and only your Self can release you.

title: Truth and Beauty: The Sad Saga of a Love Affair
description: Good and evil are the children of a divorced couple. Once Truth and Beauty were in blissful marital union, but the relationship turned sour. Truth left Her for Power. She became ugly. He lived a lie. Their kids are now fighting. Our world is the consequence. Neither Truth nor Beauty is happy. The good news is that they are now working with a couples counselor.

title: The Higher Levels of the Self
description: There are many levels to the I. Life gives us the opportunity to know the Absolute Self, the Self of uncanny wisdom and joyous rapport with the will of God, the Self of luminous clarity regarding the events on the phenomenal plane, and the Self of pure sense, of innocent existence in a living world. All these are integrated into the Whole as uncreated nonduality.

title: The World is Our Koan
description: This inaugural evening of The Dao of the Final Days book group with Shunyamurti is full of surprise revelations! The deeper meaning-morenessess and gems of insight within the powerful pages of this book, including the 7 types of Dao-scourse, are discussed, and Shunyamurti’s recitation of the poems transmits an elevated vibrational frequency that is felt in the heart, outside of ​being​-time​, helping us travel to the inter-dao-mensional reality into the realm of absolute non-dao-ality.

title: The Hard Problem is Loneliness
description: Shunyamurti reveals that death is easy to deal with, but that loneliness is what really plagues us, noting that all of our problems come from an inability to face our loneliness, that growing up means facing our loneliness, that the only solution to loneliness is only-ness, only the Real will suffice, and then goes on to explain the root of loneliness, encouraging us to go through the black hole of loneliness and reach the Real Self that is beyond loneliness.

title: Overcoming the Illusion of Death: Find the Immortal Self Within
description: In this opening night teaching (from the retreat, “Overcoming Death”), Shunyamurti delves deeply into the true meaning behind overcoming the illusion of death, and how the realization of immortality—because what is never born can never die—will help bring the living truth to a dying world, the price of which is ego death, the remains of which is the Real.

title: Livestream Satsang 02.16.20
description: Topics covered in this teaching:

title: Shunyamurti Q&A (From May Livestream)
description: Topics covered in this teaching:

title: Livestream Satsang 03.27.19
description: Topics covered in this teaching:

title: Livestream Satsang 01.16.19
description: Topics covered in this teaching:

title: Livestream Satsang 11.14.18
description: Topics covered in this teaching:

title: How the Western Mind Bent the Bhagavad Gita
description: According to the Jewish tradition, we are in the High Holy Days. According to the news, we are in the lowest unholy days. Both are true. As global tensions escalate, this paradox points directly to the teaching of the Bhagavad Gita: The war to be concerned with is the inner battle between your ego and your soul. The Gita has inspired much of modern Western philosophy—from Schopenhauer and Hegel to Nietzsche and beyond—yet none of those thinkers got the real message being transmitted. Accurate un

title: The World Is Coming Apart—So that God Can Bring Us Together
description: The world is not going to hell but coming out of hell into a new state of heaven. God-consciousness will soon replace ego-consciousness. We are immortal and eternal in our true nature. There is nothing to fear in this transition. Faith and resonance with the highest vibrational frequency will bring immunity from suffering.

title: Not Death But Renaissance is Our Destiny
description: A divine process is underway, whether an individual recognizes it or not. All that happens is the will of the Infinite Intelligence that is unfolding the cosmic drama. Evil energies are now in the process of destroying themselves, creating conditions for a renaissance of the highest potencies of God-consciousness to emerge and bring a new world into being. All who love God will soon feel their kundalini rising rapidly toward infinity.

title: Enter the Awesome Presence of Infinite Mind
description: Once you have broken through the illusion of egocentric perception and recognized the personal identity as fictional, there is no going back to ignorance. Even though the illusory ego will try to fill you with dread as it disintegrates in the full light of Infinite Consciousness, once the traces of ego identity have all been annihilated, the inconceivable power and scope of the Self will be realized as all there ever was or will be.

title: You Too are Made of Plasma
description: The metaphor of plasma brings clarity as to the higher powers of the mind. Once the alchemical process of kundalini cultivation is underway, the energy of consciousness can be modulated to higher frequencies that will come to vibrate through the body and the morphogenic space. This revisioning of the meaning of yoga makes the transcendent heights of Total Presence more immediately accessible.

title: We Are Near the End of the Calm Before the Storm
description: This may be the last moment of calm to complete the rite of passage beyond the ego and its illusions and realize the deathless Self—before the storm of global conflict reaches its climactic phase. You may need to change your paradigm of reality to see our situation clearly in the context of total consciousness—to be able to do what is necessary to be free of a limiting identity.

title: To Be Signless is to Be Sinless
description: A reading from an ancient scripture reveals the single most important paradigm shift necessary to power the transformation of life and consciousness.

title: Our Human Tribe is in a Rite of Passage
description: The world is undergoing an ordeal analogous to the Sun Dance ritual of some native American tribes. This is the ultimate archetypal process of collective death and restoration. For this event to be fruitful, we must be willing to make the only sacrificial offering that will suffice: the oblation of ego consciousness.

title: Your Heroic Potential Will Soon Be Activated
description: Life in this dreamfield is becoming impossible. It is already surreal, and showing signs of suicidal madness. When the dream dies, the souls will all awaken from the illusion of lack and lostness to the light of eternal presence, the fulfillment of desire. Each has the freedom to awaken at any moment, simply by opening the heart to the fullness of love.

title: Fictional Beings Are All in Search of Their Author
description: To become who you really are, you must drop the one you think you are and abide in not-knowing, in radically accepting that nothing is known at all. Nothing can be figured out by thinking. When every fiction has fallen away, the Absolute Real is revealed. Life was only ever about this.

title: Celebrate the Dawn of Shiva’s Light!
description: The Light of God is always shining. But the ego mind has turned away from the Source and is lost in the darkness of delusion. This is the moment that the Supreme Self has chosen to return, bringing all souls back to the eternal stillness and peace of the Infinite Merciful Heart of the Real. For the ego, this will seem like world destruction, while for the illumined souls, this is the moment of redemption. The end is also the new beginning. The Kingdom of Heaven awaits those who surrender all to

title: Ego Particles are Particularly Prickly
description: The best alternative to living in a society of narcissistic egos is to move into nonduality. There is, after all, only one Real Self. Why be crowded when you can enjoy infinite spaciousness?

title: Rise from the Cross of Concepts into the Bliss of the Inconceivable
description: Our main spiritual obstacle is our ignorance of the Real. That ignorance is constituted by the mind, the very instrument being used to strive toward God-realization. The paradox is that we must let go of wanting what we hold dearest in order to attain fulfillment.

title: May the God-Self Be Born in the Manger of Your Mind
description: The holy night of Christmas is a mythical representation of your own metamorphosis from human to divine. When the grace of silence descends upon the mind, the heart will blossom in overwhelming love of God and the sacred incarnation will occur.

title: The Bodhisattva’s Catch-22
description: A wisdom school is a boutique where would-be bodhisattvas come to get their diamond mind cut properly so it can be set in the heart of the lotus. This is all explained by the expert diamond cutter in his sutra of that name.

title: Perfection Includes Ignorance and Delusion
description: To fully accept the perfection of all that seems to arise and occur in the world, because of recognition that all is the will of God, Whose wisdom and benevolence is infinite, is the ultimate test of faith. Only with complete authentic surrender to that Absolute Goodness of the Real will the heart open to unconditional love. And this is the portal to eternal bliss.

title: St. Isaac and the Godly Glory of Stillness
description: An extensive reading of the wisdom writings of St. Isaac of Syria reveals the congruence of Christian mystical teachings with those of Buddhism, Advaita, and nondual Shaivism. The goal of meditation is unwavering stillness of mind. The Zero Point is coextensive with infinity and filled with supernal light, power, awestruck wonder, and blissful union with the Absolute.

title: Know the Real from the Unreal
description: Do you really grok that the world is a dream? But who is the Dreamer? Are you not both? But since the dream is only the mind of the Dreamer, are not the two really one? And when the Dreamer stops dreaming, What abides?

title: The Heart Must Have a Single Yearning
description: If you wholeheartedly yearn for God, or Self, or Infinite Consciousness—and have no other conflicting desires—then the path is easy and effortless. Simply attune to the Source of Presence.

title: You Are Bringers of the Power of Freedom
description: All are called, but few choose to answer the Call. If you do surrender to the will of God, you will become a Light-Bearer and a Bringer of the Power of Freedom. This is your mission, if you have the courage and nobility to accept the great responsibility to transform the world into a paradise.

title: The World Will Soon Die—But the Self is Deathless
description: Fewer can remain in denial with every day that passes, as time accelerates toward the Eschaton. All systems are breaking down. The entire suffering hell ream of the world will soon undergo euthanasia, and all will return to the Light of God. Let us voluntarily surrender our ego identity programs, so that we can be fully saturated by the blissful luminosity of the Supreme Self—and leave this video game victorious!

title: Regain Your Sovereignty in the Supreme Abode
description: One Supreme Intelligence governs all the fractal levels of reality and all the nodes of limited consciousness that arise in them. Through clear understanding and accurate meditation, the attention can attain its original abode in the Source Point of all manifestation. The One Self is the puppet master, pulling all the strings that control the fate of the simulation

title: Suspend Your Rejection of the Real
description: Once humans collectively bought into the scientistic paradigm of mere physicalism, it was inevitable that all would be influenced as well by the nihilistic creed that God is dead. However, that news was exaggerated. All that died was the soul’s connection to the light and wisdom of the Supreme Self. Now, it is urgent to shift from deicide to egocide, to attune to the vibrational frequency of Pure Presence, and to become free of all delusions.

title: The Supreme Intelligence is Morphing the Planetary Field
description: Unbeknownst to the non-player characters (NPCs) in this simulation—which means every individual human becoming—every micro-change in the matrix is directed by the Infinite Intelligence that is playing this fascinating game of solitaire. The One Self perceives through every node of subjectivity, including that of inanimate matter. The One Self designs, sustains, and alters every subject in accord with the inherent power of limitless creative capacity. Because the One Self has decreed that every s

title: Anything Could Happen During this Solar Eclipse!
description: It may be a useful exercise to entertain a few wild speculations about what could happen during the imminent solar eclipse. There is enough circumstantial evidence that strange plots are afoot to justify a warning to the wise: be prepared for anything. And since we are now in an unprecedented historic moment, on the brink of the end of the age, Pandora’s box has been opened, and all the demons have been unleashed. It is urgent to attune to the Supreme Presence, and the attainment of Liberation.

title: You Shall Find Only What You Want
description: The human ego, in its postmodern end-of-kali-yuga form, is obsessed with its bodily form and its self-definition. It desperately needs to create a defined personality with fixed views and prejudice against other paradigms of reality, since otherwise it cannot hold on to the feeling that it exists. The ego’s lack of existence thus is repressed and over that black hole is projected the image of a self-fashioned fictional entity that believes it is real. The entity likewise constructs an unreal wor

title: The One Light Determines Every Destiny
description: The divine light that you are will awaken the ego to your true nature at the exact moment this is ordained by the light itself. Simply open to the Source and be absorbed in the intensity of the Supreme Presence.

title: Free Yourself from Delusions and Limitations
description: Consciousness has fallen into two correlative sets of delusions. The first is the delusion of false identity and its sequelae. This triggers the second set of delusions, those that create a false limitation of our intelligence, power, freedom, creativity, and time. We have a responsibility to overcome these false beliefs. Our primary tools in that project are faith, love, reason, and steadfast determination to realize the ultimate Truth.

title: The Rebirth of Divine Eros Will Transform the World
description: Merge the attention with the Infinite Self—and all the forgotten secrets of the soul will be revealed. The atrophied powers of the higher mind are still latent and waiting to be activated. Drop dependence on external technology, which is oppressive, and relearn the mastery of thought—and gain the grace of freedom.

title: The Return to Our True Nature: The Meaning of Maha Shiva Ratri
description: Consciousness must go through the gateway of language without getting caught on the barbed wire of beliefs or paralyzed by paradox. To reach the Supreme Real, our attention must abandon its identifications with name and form and its attachments to the imaginary and the symbolic. To attain nonduality, the ego and its inherent fear of aloneness must be shed. To reach the Infinite, all concepts produced by the finite mind in its longing for certainty must also be dropped. Only in total Emptiness an

title: Why Reject or Limit Your Genius?
description: On the spiritual journey, there comes a point of no return. Then, one must take the risk of leaving behind the ego mind, and entering the realm of the Divine Presence. The macrocosm is on this trajectory, as well as every microcosm.

title: Mimetic Rivalry is the Root of Evil
description: This explanation of Rene Girard’s model of social functioning, based on the ego’s uncertainty about what it wants, brings new clarity to our personal difficulties and those in the realm of macropolitics. The discourse describes the chain of effects brought about by coveting the attributes or possessions of a chosen other. These cascade from envy to imitation, to rivalry, and to some level of symptomatic violence. We must become free of scapegoating and being victimized, as well as from all rescu

title: Overcoming the Indoctrination into Nihilism
description: As one goes ever deeper into one’s inner being, past the ego and its shadow, the paradigm of reality shifts repeatedly as the perception is purified and accurate discernment of the Real comes more into focus. The enigmas presented by the false beliefs we were taught and then, more deeply, by the pairs of opposites that keep the mind split and in internal conflict and confusion, are gradually overcome. The outer becomes recognized as the inner. The Other is reclaimed as the Self. Unity is perceiv

title: Fear of Vulnerability Underpins Self-Alienation
description: A realized yogi sheds his skin, but does not grow a new one. Since there is no outside and no inside to the Real, no skin boundary or defensive shield is either necessary or possible. The Self has no other, no enemy, and no limit. All fear drops away.

title: The Heart is an Eternal Love Triangle
description: For those souls who are mature and ready for God-realization and Liberation while in the living body, there is a wormhole through psychological space and all its developmental levels that will bring your consciousness into direct, immediate, and final absorption into the Infinite Absolute Self. But it requires burning the ego in the sacred sacrificial fire until there is complete annihilation and emptiness. Few take this path.

title: Resonate With Total Presence
description: By cultivating resonance with the vibrational frequency of pure and total presence—the Supreme Real—new meanings and insights precipitate from the Infinite Intelligence, the Mind of God. These downloads re-program the destiny of one’s becoming, leading to the attainment of eternal Being.

title: Urgent Message in Our Morphogenic Field
description: Since the cosmos is fractally constructed, a common logic of unfoldment exists at every level, in every node of consciousness. This produces in the egoic mind a morphogenic effect that pervades our reality, and manifests as wondrous synchronicities and as similar sorts of self-sabotaging glitches, self-destructive attitudes, stupid reactions, and vain clashes of conflicting wills. If we can reach the inner root of these karmic patterns, then consciousness can free itself of bondages and return t

title: The 7 Dimensions of Reality…and the Divine Functions of the Self
description: Knowing the structure of reality can accelerate the attainment of mastery over mind. The divine energies, when embodied, can activate the latent powers of consciousness in miraculous ways.

title: Leave the Inferno of the Ego Mind
description: The chattering ego mind functions as a veil to separate our consciousness from the realization of the Whole. Within the ego, the mindfield is further fragmented into many illusory parts, each with a different drive and orientation toward the Other. Some parts are helpful and compassionate, others may be dark and demonic. Still others may be sad, frightened, anxious, ashamed, confused, and feel powerless. This turns the ego into a conflicted hell realm. There is a path of purification that leads

title: The Power that Ends All Anguish and Delusion Awaits Within
description: Salvation can only be our own receipt of forgiveness from the Merciful Lord Who abides within the Heart as the Self. Once forgiven for the sin of egocentricity and separation from the Self, one is freed from the delusions of duality. Perception becomes cleansed of its defilements and the perfection of the divine beauty of the Real is recognized with awe and wonder. Consciousness gladly surrenders to be absorbed into the Blissful Light.

title: God’s Light Ignites the Final Bonfire of Vanities
description: Consciousness is constantly morphing, causing the world to appear as a metastable process of mutation, leading to an entropic disjunction of desires and drives, reflected as a world on the edge of chaos. Consciousness and its world both undergo the passage into annihilation. But then, as the chaos converts into pure potentiality, it morphs into a new and perfect order. Thus, the world dies and is reborn. Worldhood itself is without beginning or end. Time is not other than eternity.

title: Know the Joy of Being Born as God
description: The symbolic meaning of Christmas is a message of universal urgency and personal significance to every conscious being. It is a prefigured celebration of your awakening to your divine nature and the rebirth of the character you play in the matrix as an avatar, a Buddha, a manifestation of God, begotten as the Only Self, by the blissful union of Shakti and Shiva. Blessings for living in the glory of Theosis.

title: How to Bring Life to this Valley of Dry Bones
description: Because we have abandoned our love for the Mother Goddess and the Father God, and their internal integration as pure mutuality of divine adoration, the life energy has gone out of our archetypal forms and fallen into the morbid and demonic realm of the hungry ghosts and zombie egos, which clash in the darkness of a desert world on the brink of self-annihilation. Only a return to the fullness of the Zero will emanate the salvific power of the Source of our Being.

title: Disregard the Ego Narratives
description: No one is in bondage. Only the choice to believe the ego narratives diverts the attention from the Supreme Presence within—and equally without. This is a universal truth. The illumined sages of every spiritual lineage have passed this on as their legacy. That is why it is often called the Perennial Philosophy. But theoretical knowledge is not enough: The habit of forgetfulness of Self must be abandoned.

title: Recognize the Reality of Dreaming and the Dreaming of Reality
description: Ultimate reality is closer than the present moment and never becomes past or future. To perceive this Truth is already to be liberated and forever free. But the timebound mind, which veils the Real, must be dropped so that all is revealed and transcended.

title: The Construction and Destruction of Hell
description: On the day of this teaching, the Hindu holiday of the destruction of Hell was being celebrated. The metaphysical logic of how the Hell realm was originally constructed and how it is now being destroyed is explained in this seminar lecture.

title: The Empowering Secrets of our Paradoxical Reality
description: The Buddha Mind loves paradox. Once you are energized by the recognition that the world is Nirvana, and that Nirvana is not other than the apparent world, all the predispositions of the linear mind that produce the bondage of reification drop away spontaneously. In the revelation of the Self as naked Presence, all is perceived as miraculous and awesomely beautiful. Attainment of Liberation is the result of dropping all fear and desire, all thought constructs, and all judgments.

title: The Aghori Option May Be Your Best Strategy
description: Today, many people are functioning as hungry ghosts. And many are paralyzed spiritually by feelings of disgust and shame about their self-images, histories, and modes of self-presentation. In this context, Shunyamurti retells a story originally told by Acharya Sthaneshwar Timalsina about his meeting with an Aghori guru—and explores the implications of the extreme lifestyles and practices of those pariah yogis with amazing powers. Through this analysis, we learn how to raise our consciousness to

title: We Are to Merge into the Eternal Flame
description: Now is the time when all the secrets of reality are being revealed, as we approach the climactic moment of Redemption. But the password to enter the storehouse of wisdom is the inner silence of adoration of the Self. This is the Flame that immolates the ego and brings Liberation.

title: Attunement to the Self is Our Function
description: The world is becoming ever more polarized, and soon everyone will join the living dead—either as a zombie or an avadhuta, one who has gone through ego death. The latter will free the souls trapped in the state of the former.

title: Antagonism Can Only Lead to Mutual Destruction
description: People operating at the ego level go to war out of love—whether it is love of family, country, land, treasure, conquest, or glory. But only lovers of God—who have realized God in all beings and therefore cannot hate anyone or act with aggression or violence toward anyone—can bring peace to the world. To love God is to love your Self. This love transcends all worlds. It is now the will of God to bring complete peace by returning all souls to their Source in the Unmanifest Supreme Reality.

title: The Mystical Meaning of the Mideast War: Armageddon Now?
description: The war in Ukraine has suddenly disappeared from the news, replaced by a new war in the Middle East. Rather than getting lost in the labyrinth of conspiracy theories about the identity of the puppet master, or paranoia about the likelihood of this escalating into global nuclear war, it is imperative to remain centered in the Real Self and understand the spiritual significance of what is unfolding—and to act in accord with the Dao of these final days.

title: The Morphing of Perception to Reveal the Real
description: The purpose of spiritual practice is to morph the mode of perception by eliminating the egoic blockages and opening the divine eye. This enables a massive input of information from the noosphere and establishment in the Mind of God. This will make one immune to the chaos of these final days of Kali Yuga and enable one to perceive the unfoldment of God’s plan and the beauty of the new world being dreamed.

title: Become God’s Fearless Lion
description: A Sufi poet reveals the salvific truth of our real nature. Now is the time to break free of all limiting beliefs and overcome the illusion of mortality and materiality. Our next retreat—The Great Escape—is designed to enable us to break out of the prison camp of the mind, liberate our souls, and bring a beautiful end to this dying world—and a divine new beginning.

title: To Worship False Gods is to Cheat Yourself of the Real
description: The worship of idols like money, youth, prestige, power, or physical attractiveness is the main obstacle to union with the One God Who is Real. One must be willing to grow out of such earthbound attitudes to connect with your authentic Self.

title: Secrets of the Kundalini Assemblage Points
description: Our mental narratives transfigure infinity into a bardo state. We become enslaved to our own preconceptions and self-fulfilling prophecies. At each assemblage point, the kundalini becomes configured by a different paradigm, and different synchronicities and karmic potentialities arise. At the highest levels, we become free of confinement in contexts and conditions. The awesome and inconceivable destroyer and creator of worlds, the GodSelf, becomes revealed.

title: The Wisdom of the Sufi Poet Who Started It All
description: Hakim Sana’i, the first major Sufi poet to express the message of the radical spiritual revolution that would be carried on later by such voices as Attar, Rumi, and Hafiz, delivers the punchy nectar of divine intoxication that comes of annihilating the ego. Even a few bullets from this ecstatic shotgun of Truth can do the job on any ego who listens.

title: Learn to Connect to Your Superconscious Self
description: Yogic powers come from learning how to de-collapse one’s quantum/qualium wave functions. This requires extinguishing projections and recognizing the true nature of the phenomenal world. This return to our Supreme Reality will free us from attachment to empty jouissance and enable us to produce a divine global renaissance.

title: Our Freedom is Inalienable…if We Make Use of It!
description: We have total freedom. But we have used it to put ourselves in bondage. The good news is that what we fear is unreal. By summoning up our courage, our inherent wisdom, and our divine love, we can break all our illusory chains and re-dream the world as a realm of freedom, beauty, goodness, joy, and creative power.

title: Our Lives Are a Contest Between Light and Darkness
description: Life is a sport—a contest between good and evil, truth and illusion, life and death, divine light and demonic darkness. If you want to have a chance of winning, you must combine wildness and discipline, you must free your creative intelligence from all limiting paradigms, and you must defeat the primary opponent: the narcissistic ego. The secret of success is to become possessed by the Almighty Spirit!

title: What Level of Intelligence is Moving You?
description: Who is playing you in the chess game that constitutes your life? Your best gambit is to invoke the Goddess. She knows how to employ the Queen to offer the one sacrifice that brings victory over Death.

title: You Contain the Entire Universe
description: Our true nature is freedom—and that can never be lost. All our desires emerge from the temporary forgetfulness of that reality. Desire is always for the Real Self. We must desire more intensely if we wish to realize our sublime, infinite, ecstatic essence.

title: A Coherent Way to Understand Reality
description: There are no limits to the potentialities of consciousness. If you know where you are on an accurate map of reality, that will become clear. You will also learn that the world is made of language and is produced by pulsations of mental energy. This is information everyone needs to know—in order to cope with the rapidly unfolding events in this mind-driven matrix.

title: Why We Must Lose the World to Regain Our Souls
description: We’re at the end of the line. Life has become hollow. Now is the moment we must be hallowed. God has secretly returned to the world, but we must choose to return to God by detaching from all worldly values and attuning to the energy coming from the Source, which will infuse us with the blissful and beautiful mandala that will congeal into a new world of perfect goodness.

title: The Eye of Shiva Sees the Implicate Order
description: To be Christed is to be anointed with the energy of the GodSelf. This is also the opening of the third eye, the great perfection, the unveiling of ultimate reality, and endless bliss. It is also the revelation of nonduality, the unity of the implicate and explicate orders.

title: Choose Your Future: Monstrous or Miraculous
description: We have the gift of free will and can now choose either a life of divinization or one of degradation and destruction. Why not dance in delight in the sky of perfect mind rather than stay trapped in the ruined, lawless, and loveless landscapes of illusion?

title: The World Ends When You Realize It Never Began
description: Consciousness is Beauty, Beatitude, and Bliss. But once the desire to possess that beauty arises, it becomes perceived as an external world, and the perceiving mind is afflicted by lack and separation. The more one complains, the more ugly and antagonistic one’s world becomes. And one is then trapped on the wheel of karma. The Truth is that all is forever perfect! The kingdom of heaven arrives when one sees that. This is the deep insight of Dzogchen and the deepest teaching of all authentic spir

title: The Self Awakens from the Fractal Field of Dreams
description: You can avoid the meat grinder of a bardo state encounter with wrathful deities if you are willing to go through all three deaths, starting now! Then the fullness of creative power will return.

title: How to Build a Bridge to Nirvana
description: The ego keeps files on everyone and everything in its life. These files fill the mind. The ego must be de-filed so that the undefiled Self is revealed. In effortless presence redemption is achieved.

title: How to Emanate a Crown of Light
description: A lightning bolt of love from the Cloud of the Unknowable can transform one’s noxious psychic drives into divine Presence. Sublimation of ego tendencies results from sustaining the pillar of light that remains when one adores the Absolute Self.

title: No Swimming in the Mirage!
description: The Diamond-Lightning Sutra strikes again! Buddha one-ups Heraclitus: you can’t swim in the same stream even once—because there is no stream! There’s no real water in a dream.

title: Will the Hegemon Play its Last Card?
description: The state of the world today—and what to expect in the imminent future—is the topic covered in this discourse. The historical arc stretching from the assassination of JFK to the current candidacy of RFK, Jr., and from the Cold War to the present getting-hot war between NATO and the Russia-China alliance, the woes of the hegemon are detailed. The implications of what is unfolding are truly earth-shattering. We are urged to view this from the perspective of the highest Truth and level of our Being

title: Observe the Play of the Weak and the Strong
description: The poetry of Attar is unpacked to reveal its profound spiritual teachings. The relationship between the weak and the strong elements in the ego will determine its health and willingness to grow and recognize the Truth. The bottom line is that the ego must realize it is nothing, a shadow, and one must live only for what is real and eternal—which is the Beloved Self.

title: Aromatherapy for the Living Corpse
description: Another reading from the great Sufi mystic Attar’s petite poems of passionate power opens the heart to fuse with the Beloved. Through love of the Real, we come alive to our true nature, instead of existing as living corpses.

title: Where Reason Fails, the Heart Prevails
description: The love poems to and from God channeled by the revered Sufi mystic Farideddin Attar, and collected in the book entitled Sweet Sorrow, may be the most potent medicine for cynical minds afflicted by toxic forms of love. The power of these numinous nuggets of gnosis to re-connect one with our true nature is astonishing. Be warned: This bliss may be contagious!

title: The Inconceivable Truth Will Burst the Ego into Buddhahood
description: The Diamond Sutra, also known as the Lightning Strike Sutra, reveals the paradoxical clarity of the awakened Self, and enables the attainment of the merit which entitles us to dream a perfect world.

title: Liberation is Complete Fixation on the Self
description: Sri Ramana teaches the direct realization of the Self, requiring only tireless devotion. Grace is the reward for serving God wholeheartedly, with complete indifference toward the apparent world.

title: The Secret of God’s Exile and Return
description: The ancient epic known as the Ramayana is a time capsule of information and instruction for facing the final days of Kali Yuga. Knowledge of the structure of consciousness and its permutations, including the soul’s romancing and renouncing of desire, is bringing the ego face to face with the Self—and the invincible power of the Real.

title: We Have a Responsibility to Be Supernatural!
description: Shunyamurti returns for another conversation with the astute Bodhisattva Ryan McCormick, master of ceremonies at the Outer Limits of Inner Truth. The fascinating discussion concerns the life and death of civilizations and worlds. At this time, the human spirit is being weighed on the scales of divine worthiness. We must bring love and law back into unity, and regain the power to re-dream the world.

title: We Are Now Determining All Our Future Lives
description: Now is the great moment of self-determination! Here at the very end of Kali Yuga, we are creating the design of our future lives in the next cycle of time through our actions in this final lifetime before the return to the Light. We must cleanse the stains of greed, anger, and worldly attachments to function as servers of the Supreme Power and thus earn our divine right to rebirth in the kingdom of heaven that is coming soon.

title: Avoid Being Crushed by Social Collapse
description: People have lost all trust in the institutions that were supposed to serve them, but which now oppress with tyrannical force. There is no way back, now that legitimacy has been squandered. The one rational response is attunement of consciousness to the unified planetary field of intelligence that resonates with the Will of God. This attainment must be our highest priority.

title: Stop Seeking if You Wish to Find the Self
description: Existence is a veil that hides our Being. To awaken from the trance of illusion, one must stop the outward search for meaning and purpose, and simply recognize in stillness the illumined Presence, the Light of Pure Consciousness that shines behind the dark labyrinth of thought.

title: The Scalar Power of the Vajra Fills the Ether
description: An ontological shift into absolute idealism is necessary to regain our freedom and power, since the universe is mind, not matter. Sri Ramana refutes Einstein and reminds us that the ancient yogis understood the subtleties of ether, and that plasma physics is under the control of our cosmic intellect.

title: Time is Going Through a Pole Shift
description: The tides of Time are changing now, from the high tide of pravritti to the low tide of nivritti, as the ancient sages called them. Those who do not factor that in to their life strategies and goals will be quite disappointed (which is an understatement). But those who do attune to the teleological will discover one can ride a bliss wave from here to eternity. There are, of course, certain skills involved and one little renunciation.

title: How to Ward Off Malignant Influences
description: We can learn how to shield ourselves against negative projections and to attract the highest projections of the Supreme Self.

title: A Manifesto of Unified Spiritual Anarchy
description: We will explore how the ruling cabal planned and carried out their dark conspiracy to take down the human species, how they reduced our ability to understand and resist their diabolic plot, and how it will unfold. But the rulers (and everyone else) have a surprise in store. There is a bigger picture than nearly anyone has seen. Higher powers than those of humans are participating in this climax to world history. If we are aligned with the supreme Force determining the outcome of this dramatic te

title: In the Beginning Was the Eschaton
description: Our consciousness is morphing rapidly toward breakdown as the social order likewise comes apart. Yet, this is the most auspicious time in history—because the Light of Truth will dawn in a few souls, and the coherence of that ultimate realization will spread throughout the planetary morphogenic field. This will bring universal salvation. Concepts are becoming obsolete as we return to the Real. We must live not in the mind, but in the Heart.

title: Self-Mastery Requires Surrender
description: Sat Yoga is the practice of Self-Realization. This requires mastery of the mind, the power to abide in inner stillness. Extremely subtle and accurate practice is the path. It helps to have a teacher who cannot be fooled by a student’s inauthentic feelings and delusional phenomena.

title: The Anguish and the Ecstasy are One!
description: A few words from a little-known Sufi poet-sage of the tenth century can pry open your heart with an explosive charge of Truth that you cannot resist. Shaikh Abu-Saeed Abil-Kheir, better known by the title of his book: Nobody Son of Nobody, ably translated by Vraje Abramian, will bring a different kind of tear to flow from your eyes. Hear these poems and weep.

title: The Secret of the Fearlessness of True Yogis
description: To cope with the cataclysmic events that are about to erupt in the world, we must be living in Truth. The ego is based on a false premise and is filled with delusional projections. If we do not become free of its paranoid attitude and closed heart, we will not be able to connect with the God-Self. Use wisely the time that remains.

title: The World is Not Real, But Symbolic!
description: Shunyamurti encourages us to be role models in the process of divinization. It is possible to live a divine life–if one is willing to trade the ego-mind for the mind of God, and see the supreme perfection of all, not with the eye of the ego, or even with the eye of the soul, but with the single eye of Shiva, which keeps the consciousness constantly divinized in this confluence age that we are being called to redream a divine world.

title: The Function of the Demonic is to Spur Us to Become Divine
description: “As we approach the final days of this final period of the Kalpa, the events that occur within the cycle of time become ever more extreme, and the extreme polarities of consciousness become ever more powerful, and the middle range of the spectrum of consciousness becomes weaker.” In this morning teaching, Shunyamurti reminds us that we have the power to choose between the divine and the demonic energies, and the moment of choice is now. Is your soul encased by the ego or will you decide to take

title: What Does it Mean to Kill Your Ego?
description: What does it mean to kill your ego? Shunyamurti offers a solution to the problem of the ego–no mind! Take refuge in the effortless, natural state–your true nature–and you will discover your identity is a fiction, all is contained, ordained, and explained by your true Self, and reality will unfold without obstruction.

title: The Practice of Nondual Devotion
description: The true significance of Namaste is revealed, along with the real meaning of dreams, insights into the state of deep sleep, and the revelatory connection to the source of life energy.

title: The Topology of Reality is a Klein Bottle
description: Shunyamurti casts light on the archetype of all illnesses: every symptom is a symbol and a blessing, if one is able to understand the Klein bottle aspect of reality–that every ego’s got it all inside out.

title: May Santa Light Your Jyoti Bindu! Hear the Para Nada Sing!
description: On Christmas Eve, the godly gifts of bindu and nada (the light and soundless song of the Self) are given to those who gather at the Tree of Life to be Christed. It is time to end the war with God, our alienation from our divine nature. It is the moment designated by Source to return to our Infinite Spirit. May we be the ones who at last bring the joy of Rapture to the world.

title: The Ten Co-Mindments to Abide in Great Bliss
description: Shunyamurti offers a new set of Ten Co-Mindments as organizing principles for the arising of a new people who will bring a more beautiful world into Being. To participate, we must abide in Maha Sukha, the Great Bliss, and channel the power, love, and wisdom of the Supreme Self.

title: How to Become an Angel
description: In this retreat teaching, Shunyamurti outlines the alchemical process for producing divine nectar: dilate the dreamfield, prime the pump, and add the no no’s–this will burn the nigredo in the fire of divine love and the natural state will be revealed. This is the alchemy of ego and soul.

title: Freedom Requires Sovereignty of Consciousness
description: Do you really want to know what is happening? Shunyamurti offers a spiritual understanding of the situation at hand and an archeological perspective on the eschaton, the imminent end of the world that consciousness is now dreaming as the moment in which we have the power to choose to leap out of the matrix or languish in it. Now is the moment to get out while you still can, by finding the strength to break through the hegemonic control of your mind and into the supreme levels of consciousness th

title: Master the Slippery Logic of Nonduality
description: Shunyamurti reminds us that the world is unreal and there is only the Real, which is regained by returning to silence, where the eternal eloquence of truth can be heard and eternal presence can be felt in Absolute Absence—but in order to swaha into the infinite, we must surrender the mind that creates the illusion of time.

title: Giving Thanks for the Miracle to Come
description: This reflection upon the US holiday of Thanksgiving is offered in a way that is relevant to those of all nations, and appropriate for the tenor of the current historic moment. Many have lost all they once gave thanks for in this time of tyranny and lost ideals. What is required now is to act in such a way that future generations will be thankful for what we have done, the sacrifice we have made, to ensure the restoration of what is truly great and worthy in the human spirit. Let us transform thi

title: History is the Couples Therapy of Eros and Psyche
description: Diving deeper into the question of resistance and what needs to be overcome to fully surrender to the Highest, Shunyamurti uses the psychoanalytical concepts of Anima/Animus and the Psyche, alongside an detailed explanation of the 3 aspects of the Tetragrammaton, to reveal the disjoint between the soul and the ego and the value of integrating masculine and feminine energies.

title: Why the West Failed to Become Civilized
description: Shunyamurti outlines the 7 phases of history of Kali Yuga West–and the downward spiral of collective consciousness that reveals why the West has failed to become civilized and why criminals now run the world.

title: You Must Pass These Exams to Get Off the Wheel of Karma
description: Shunyamurti describes the SATs for Sat Yogis: You have to simultaneously complete Shakti’s Aptitude Test and Shiva’s Aptitude Test, a set of circumstances that require answers that paradoxically suits both tests, which have completely opposite value systems and types of attitudes, that require one to jettison the FALSE (Feelings Attuned to the Lack of Self Empathy to becomes TRUE (Transcendental Realization of Unity as Emptiness). If you pass the test, you can reach the summit of the Mountain of

title: …Until You Fill the Ego’s Empty Heart
description: Shunyamurti opens the Sangha Rainy Retreat with an invitation to find freedom now—through true meditation. When we flatline the mind, consciousness expands, shifting from the unreal to the Real, and the power to redream the world returns.

title: True Reason Brings Harmony and Redemption
description: What is Self-attunement? In this teaching on “The 7 Stations of Self-Attunement,“ Shunyamurti shares how to live a life true to the Will of the Divine. By increasing our intelligence, we can untie the knot that traps us in the lower chakras and use Reason to rise up the kundalini ladder to the realm of Pure Spirit.\nShunyamurti honors Yom Kippur, the highest holy day of atonement with a teaching about (the 7 stations of) Self-attunement and the 7 turnings of Judaic Dharma.

title: The Secret of the Seven Turnings of the Dharma Wheel
description: Shunyamurti uses the rise and fall of Buddhist approaches to reveal the nature of one’s resistance to Liberation; these turnings of the wheel of Buddha dharma return us to Sat Yoga, the final destiny of completion for all beings everywhere.

title: Take Control of the High Ground: the Morphic Field
description: Do you wish to join the spiritual revolution? Shunyamurti encourages all to take back control by first mastering your own mind so you can become an unshakeable being that abides on high ground–no matter the state of the world. Claim your spiritual freedom and almighty power here and now!

title: The Unreal Self Cannot Know Real Love
description: It is time to face the facts of life: You cannot make contact with anything unless you yourself are Real, and the entire project of the ego is to make contact with the imaginary. This world is a hologram, a simulation, an illusion—there is nothing out there. Letting go of belief in any and all self-images, self-concepts, identifications with the body or with the mind, or even with the heart, is the key to real validation and valid realization. This teaching was recorded on the morning of Septemb

title: You Are the Playwright of the Cosmic Drama
description: Shunyamurti reminds us that the dream of time arises in the eternal mind, and that the final act–awakening–is already written in the greatest play ever made by the great playwright of Creation, the infinite, eternal Self.

title: Truth Will Electrocute the False
description: Shunyamurti answers a series of questions on how to attain real freedom by releasing false beliefs, what the world situation is here to teach us, and how to navigate the current crisis and achieve the optimal outcome for all. This clip is taken from an interview with Ryan McCormick hosted on the Outer Limits of Inner Truth Podcast: https://www.outerlimitsradio.com/shunyamurti/

title: Authenticity is Required for Psychological Survival
description: It’s time to get Real! By abiding in authenticity, the authentic Self is realized, so drop all the masks and stand naked in your true nature and sumerience the supreme peace of authenticity.

title: The Love/Hate Dialogues of René and Rainer Rilke
description: Shunyamurti shares about the life and poetry of Rilke, introducing the double soul syndrome theory and the cause of the fragmentation that turned Rilke’s life into poetry.

title: Apocalypse Soon: The Last Two Horsemen Are Galloping
description: Shunyamurti explains the dialectic of death, using the philosophy of Hegel to help us understand the current planetary phase of mass death, along with the coming phase of planetary death, the rolling apocalypse that is helping us to prepare for the ultimate revelation that ultimately defies all logic– the mysterious Mastermind of God is behind it all.

title: Accomplish This One Task
description: Shunyamurti encourages us to remember the Self through all of Its manifestations in order to receive the power of love, redemption, and salvation, and to accomplish the one task to realize the Self.

title: Complexity is the Expression of Simplicity
description: Shunyamurti shares the real situation we face at the end of Kali Yuga–we live in a world of dancing landscapes, and our ability to deal with these shifts is one of the secrets of life. How does one attain the accuracy to move within a dancing landscape? Accurate alignment with the laws of the universe will yield the power to achieve potency through purity—and the wisdom to achieve the ultimate aim—full empowerment!

title: Live Free: Saturated With Conscience​
description: In the first of the Spirit in Ashes book group series, Shunyamurti outlines the “inauthenticity paradigm”, a call to face the failures of conscience that will lead one to the fullness of death–but to do this one must recognize that ego death is the true source of authenticity in life and the ultimate freedom of consciousness.

title: The Strange Itinerary of the Journey to Liberation
description: Take the journey to Liberation! In this opening retreat teaching, Shunyamurti outlines a 7-stop itinerary to bring consciousness back to its true nature, from the flea market to a gourmet restaurant where we can get divinely drunk, to the 7-chakra bookstore, the diamond market, and then the ultimate treasure house, where all of the riches and wealth of our divine nature are stored, on to the Liberation Gate, and finally Freedom!

title: What is the Upper Death Drive?
description: Shunyamurti explains the Upper Death Drive, the drive within consciousness to kill the ego and return to God via an ever-increasing drive for love and meaning, adding that the Death Drive (both Upper and Lower) is increasing in all beings as we approach the end of Kali Yuga.

title: Connect All the Dots of Death and God is Revealed
